text: Lovelock is a city in Nevada. It lies in Pershing County and is the only incorporated city in the county. In 2020, 1,805 people lived there. There's a medium-security prison. There is also a train station. Settlers on their way to California used to stop in Lovelock. Today, the city's economy is mostly based on farming and mining. There's also a little tourism. ==References== Category:Cities in Nevada Category:County seats in Nevada
title: Lovelock, Nevada
